looking at the latest update 5 here on the bay,once extracted you can see that the version is 1.4.21.0 when you right click TESV and check properties/details...now when doing the same right clicking this Creation kit exe....in properties and checking details...version is 1.4.23.0...so I am guessing that an Update 6 may be required for this to work.

Don't install it in your steamapps directory unless that's where you have Skyrim installed (of course if that's the case then just download it from Steam itself).  I don't know where the .ncf goes, but the stuff in the Skyrim folder goes in your Skyrim directory folder (for me it's Program Files(x86)/Bethesda/Skyrim).  I think the crashing is due to a misplace of the .ncf file.  Also, where is the .ini files?  The GECK required some .ini files.  I remember it crashed for me because I didn't have them in the right spot.
it crash immediately, the problem could be because of ''Steam''
for me starts opening just fine then suddenly it crashes, I believe it's missing an update of sorts.

@GObonzo: That's my thought as well. Looking at some of the comments, especially about the steam api.dll and the freezing, it also threw up the Windows Firewall for me. It didn't feel like a full crack. Ah well. I guess I'll wait until it is.

i believe the ini files are created in the same folder look in where you extracted the rar they should be called skyrimeditor.ini and skyrimeditorprefs.ini if this helps got it run just crashes at main screen

Exactly what Sivos said. It works. Just copy the contents within the folder CreationKit\creationkit main.v12\common\skyrim  (in which you downloaded) and put it in your skyrim installation directory. In my case, it is C:\Program Files (x86)\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\

Then copy the cracked creationkit.exe over the one the one you copied over. now it should work just fine. 

Good luck and happy modding
@Sivos  -- The ini files are there they are named  SkyrimEditor.ini and SkyrimeditorPrefs.ini

it may end the crashes when u run CreationKit.exe

Installation Guide :
1.download this torrent + http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5165827
(thanks to hashashh for this link)
2.Extract the file from common/skyrim to your Skyrim Installation Folder + the creation kit main.ncf
3.Extract the steam api.dll from hashashh link + copy the non steam fix creation kit.exe to your Installation Folder 
4.Voila Works Like Charms :) 
reminder: when you load skyrim main.esm there should be error just press yes to all and it's all good :)

The solution for the Creation Kit:

Download this torrent: https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6807863/The.Elder.Scrolls.V.Skyrim-[CRACK.ONLY]_-_Ali213

Get the steam_api.dll
            steamclient.dll

Pop it in you installation folder with you Creation Kit and It must work, although it gives you an error when you launch either Creation Kit or Skyrim It still works. (just ignore the warning)
